Angad Bedi Discloses Neha's Parents Were Furious After He Broke The Pregnancy News To Them
Angad Bedi Discloses Neha's Parents Were Furious After He Broke The Pregnancy News To Them
Angad Bedi and Neha Dhupia’s wedding pictures were a pleasant surprise and shock to the fans and their close friends from Bollywood. The two tied knot on May 10th and within a month, they even announced the pregnancy news to the world.
Prior to their wedding, there were plenty of speculations that the couple got married in a short span of time due to Neha’s pregnancy. And now finally Angad admitted that they did get got hitched due to Neha’s pregnancy. And also because they're in love.
Instagram
He got candid with wife and host Neha on her show No Filter, where he revealed how his parents and Neha’s parents reacted on her pregnancy before marriage.

While narrating the story, Angad mentioned how Neha’s mother got hyper after listening to this unexpected 'expecting' news. Talking to Neha, he said,
“Considering that you didn’t want to break the news that you were expecting, so we had to tell them that we need to get married and we love each other. I was extremely nervous because that was the judgment day, technically. To break the news to your parents, I really had cold feet as clearly it was not going to come from you (Neha). Everything had to come from me. I had to really man up and speak. I just had to blurt it out and see the reaction”.
Instagram
The Tiger Zinda Hai actor even revealed his parents yelled a lot at him,
“I don’t think that they were really prepared for the fact to hear the news that you were expecting.” I said, “You know what? We are going to have a baby!” Bohot jhaad padi.”
It takes guts to reveal such facts especially to Indian parents and we're glad it all worked out for them in the end.
Instagram
Neha Dhupia is in his her last trimester and will soon deliver their first child.
